RelatedSentence: Lee County voters , particularly those in Supervisor Districts 2 and 3 , will have a chance to meet and question candidates in three contested primary races .

The Chamber of Commerce 's Government Affairs Committee and the Daily Democrat are sponsoring two candidate forums - one for democratic nomination for Lee County Treasurer and one for the democratic nominations for District 2 and District 3 seats on the Lee County Board of Supervisors .
Representatives from the Chamber of Commerce and Fort Madison Partners will moderate the forums .
